name: v1_exchangerate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool exchange_rate_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get current exchange rates for currency pairs. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/exchangerate.
API description: Retrieves the exchange rate for a given currency pair using the API Ninjas Exchange Rate API.

pair.description: Currency pair to query. Must be in the form of **(currency1)_(currency2)** (e.g. **USD_EUR**)
